entry.title: Welcome to my Blog
entry.summary: The first step of a Journey
entry.content:
After postponing this idea many times in the last years, I have decided to open my blog. The main driver has always been to keep track and comment the resources that I find more usefull ore insightful.

The blog articles are not intended to follow a predefined order, but cross-references might be used in the cases needed.

I hope you enjoy the content or find something usefull on it.
